name: measurable_posPart
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝³ : Lattice α
inst✝² : AddGroup α

⊢ Measurable PosPart.posPart
decl:
@[to_additive (attr := measurability)]
theorem measurable_oneLePart [MeasurableSup α] : Measurable (oneLePart : α → α) :=
  measurable_sup_const _

name: Measurable.oneLePart
initialProofState:

hf : Measurable f

name: AEMeasurable.abs
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1

protected theorem AEMeasurable.mabs {μ : MeasureTheory.Measure β} (hf : AEMeasurable f μ) :

  measurable_mabs.comp_aemeasurable hf
